# [Interview #1076: WoR Signing Report - Bartbug, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1076#2)

#### Question

When are we going to get Hoidâ€™s book?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Hoid has 6 books, they are the 3 books of Dragonsteel, which are prequels and the last Mistborn trilogy of the nine book arc will have him as a main character.
